Message:
Kuh...!
We’re finally out of that village...!
I need to hurry and get Aura
far away from here...!

Those scum...!
Feeding me lies that it was just
taking her longer to recover...!

With no jewelry left,
they used her power by force...!

Aura was drained thin,
covered in wounds
across her entire body.
Even her hair has
been cut this short...
And, her eyes...!

“Yeah, it’s me...
I’m sorry I didn’t
make it sooner.”

“Yes, that’s definitely
Rustica’s voice...! Hehe...
Maybe...because I’m so relieved,
I feel a bit...sleepy...”

“Thank you...
for staying with me
this whole time...
Please...”

“I’m the one
who should be thanking you...!
You were the only one
who ever reached out to me...!

I’ve only made it this long
because of you...!”
Don’t leave me here all alone...!”
